subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Building (Construction)
lead_paragraph: Just days before the start of the Winter Olympics in Sochi, there are unfinished hotels, half-finished stores and a mall where the only shop that is open and thriving is a Cinnabon.
snippet: Just days before the start of the Winter Olympics in Sochi, there are unfinished hotels, half-finished stores and a mall where the only shop that is open and thriving is a Cinnabon.
